mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user( id, nickname, gender, avatar, type, status, wallet ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{nickname}, #{gender}, #{avatar}, #{type}, #{status}, #{wallet} )
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET nickname = #{nickname}, gender = #{gender}, avatar = #{avatar}, type = #{type}, status = #{status}, wallet = #{wallet} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.nickname, a.gender FROM user a
